an3.85:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.85:2.2: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, sekho hoti”ti?
an3.85:2.5: Adhisilampi sikkhati, adhicittampi sikkhati, adhipannampi sikkhati.
an3.85:2.6: Sikkhatiti kho, bhikkhu, tasma sekhoti vuccatiti.
